General.Name: Solocal Group SA
General.Description: Solocal Group S.A. provides digital services in France and internationally. Its services include connect that allows VSEs and SMEs to manage their digital presence on PagesJaunes and various mobile application or a web interface, as well as manages interactions between professionals and their customers; and booster that allows companies to increase their digital visibility in the Web. The company was formerly known as PagesJaunes Groupe and changed its name to SoLocal Group S.A. in June 2013. Solocal Group S.A. was founded in 1896 and is headquartered in Boulogne-Billancourt, France.
General.Address: 204 rond-point du Pont de SEvres, Boulogne-Billancourt, France, 92100
